knowledge_base.context: Navdeep's Work Experience: Navdeep worked as a Software Developer intern at Qanalyx Technocrats Private Limited from May 3, 2022, to August 1, 2022. knowledge_base.label: Education

knowledge_base.context: Navdeep's Projects: Navdeep developed a Movie Sentiment Prediction project using Scikit-learn, Pandas, NumPy, TF-IDF, and word embeddings. He also enhanced the Seek Portal with Generative AI features using Gemma:2b, Flask, HTML, Jinja, and JavaScript. Additionally, he created a full-stack music application with Flask backend, Vue.js frontend, Celery, Redis, SMTP, Bootstrap, Jinja2, Flask-SQLAlchemy, and SQLite. Other projects include a Ticket Booking System and a Sales and Inventory Management System.
